content.value:
When arriving at Barichara right next to the Central Park is the Real Street, the main street of the town; and from there we are 4 blocks until we reach the Santa Bárbara Park where the hostel is located.

La Juanita has private rooms and a mixed dormitory for 4 people and shared bathroom. Our family rooms, count with a double bed and single bed for 3 people, private bathroom and our double room, count with a double bed with private bathroom.

La Juanita is a space built with pleasure and thinking about the rest of its visitors; a cozy place, surrounded by nature and tranquility, 5 comfortable rooms with a maximum capacity for 18 people. The terrace of the Hostel offers our visitors an incredible view of the Cutest Town of Colombia and is the perfect space to share with the hosts of the place and the other visitors in the heat of a campfire, good wine and lots of music ...!
La Juanita has a range of services linked to the cultural programming of Barichara so that our visitors are imbued with the local Colombian culture. We generate lodging experiences in an artistic, cultural, gastronomic environment and very close to nature. Our promise is that our visitors live the La Juanita experience with simple and extraordinary moments to make your visit to Barichara memorable.
Our hostel is the perfect place to relax, find a quiet place to read, enjoy a beautiful sunset accompanied by our coffee, and live an unforgettable night with friends and music ..

The Juanita Hostel Barichara Boutique mixes the cheerful spirit of a hostel with the comfort and convenience of a hotel. La Juanita is located in a colonial house of more than 300 years recognized as an Architectural Heritage of Barichara, in one of the quietest and most exclusive areas, a few steps from Santa Barbara Park and its emblematic Chapel.

description.description:
La Juanita Hostel is a boutique hostel, located in one of the most important heritage houses of Barichara. The common areas are huge and comfortable and we have a beautiful terrace with incredible views of the town and the mountains of Barichara.
The rate includes breakfast, WiFi, hot water, pool and bar service and it’s a dream place designed thinking in the comfort and wellness of our guests.
